title: Lila -  An Inquiry into Morals by Robert M  Pirsig - Commentary on Chapter 16
description:
Is Lila as bad as all that? What does she have that your average citizen doesn't?

(Technically, Lila's last boyfriend was probably George, the Karma captain, but I don't count him for some reason...not sure what that says - or doesn't say - about Phaedrus)
